Script.label: BIP default update script
Script.script: (A:TOTAL AIR TEMPERATURE, Celsius) -5 < (A:AMBIENT IN CLOUD, Bool) 1 == (A:AMBIENT PRECIP STATE, Mask) 2 > or and if{ 1 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:0) (A:STALL WARNING, Bool) 1.0 == if{ 1 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:1) (A:ENG ON FIRE:1, Bool) 1.0 == if{ 1 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:2) (A:ENG OIL TEMPERATURE:1, Celsius) 200 > if{ 1 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:3) (A:ENG OIL PRESSURE:1, psf) 3000 < if{ 1 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:4) (A:ELECTRICAL MAIN BUS VOLTAGE, Volts) 10 < if{ 1 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:5) (A:SUCTION PRESSURE, inHg) 3 < if{ 1 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:6) (A:ROTOR RPM PCT:1, Percent over 100) 0.0 > (A:ROTOR RPM PCT:1, Percent over 100) 0.75 < and if{ 1 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:7) (A:BRAKE PARKING POSITION, Bool) 0 > if{ 3 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:8) (A:SPOILERS HANDLE POSITION, Position) 0 > if{ 3 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:9) (A:EXIT OPEN:1, Percent over 100) 0 > if{ 3 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:10) (A:FLAPS HANDLE INDEX, Number) 0 > if{ 3 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:11) (A:GENERAL ENG FUEL PUMP ON:1, Bool) 1.0 == if{ 3 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:12) (A:FUEL TANK LEFT MAIN CAPACITY, Gallons) 0 > (A:FUEL TANK LEFT MAIN LEVEL, Percent over 100) 0.25 < and if{ 1 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:13) (A:FUEL TANK CENTER CAPACITY, Gallons) 0 > (A:FUEL TANK CENTER LEVEL, Percent over 100) 0.25 < and if{ 1 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:14) (A:FUEL TANK RIGHT MAIN CAPACITY, Gallons) 0 > (A:FUEL TANK RIGHT MAIN LEVEL, Percent over 100) 0.25 < and if{ 1 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:15) (A:PITOT HEAT, Bool) 1.0 == if{ 2 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:16) (A:LIGHT BEACON, Bool) 1.0 == if{ 2 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:17) (A:LIGHT NAV, Bool) 1.0 == if{ 2 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:18) (A:LIGHT STROBE, Bool) 1.0 == if{ 2 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:19) (A:LIGHT TAXI, Bool) 1.0 == if{ 2 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:20) (A:LIGHT LANDING, Bool) 1.0 == if{ 2 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:21) (A:CABIN NO SMOKING ALERT SWITCH, Bool) 1.0 == if{ 2 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:22) (A:CABIN SEATBELTS ALERT SWITCH, Bool) 1.0 == if{ 2 } els{ 0 } (>BIP:0:23)
